pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CerebriumCerebrium is the Python package built for use with the [Cerebrium](https://www.cerebrium.ai/) platform, which allows you to deploy your machine learning models as a REST API with a single line of code.For usage consult the [documentation](https://docs.cerebrium.ai/). The repo for the documentation can be found [here](https://github.com/CerebriumAI/docs).
